resources.string:
==Orbital characteristics== **Distance from sun:** 108.2 million km (0.723 AU)
 **Eccentricity:** 0.007
 **Orbital period:** 224.7 days
 **Average orbital speed:** 35.02 km/s
 **Inclination to ecliptic:** 3.4°
 **Satellites:** None
==Physical characteristics== **Equatorial radius:** 6,052 km (0.95 Earths)
 **Flattening:** 0
 **Volume:** 9.38×10^^11^^ km³ (0.857 Earths)
 **Mass:** 4.869×10^^24^^ kg (0.815 Earths)
 **Mean density:** 5.204 g/cm³
 **Equatorial surface gravity:** 8.87 m/s² (0.904 g)
 **Escape velocity:** 10.46 km/s
 **Sidereal rotation period:** −243.0 days
 **Equatorial rotation velocity :** 6.52 km/h
 **Axial tilt:** 177.3° (retrograde)
 **Bond albedo:** 0.90
 **Surface temperature:** 735K (460°C)
==Atmosphere== **Surface pressure:** 93 bar (9.3 MPa)
 **Composition:**
 ~96.5% carbon dioxide
 ~3.5% nitrogen
 0.015% sulfur dioxide
 0.007% argon
 0.002% water vapor
 0.0017% carbon monoxide
 0.0012% helium
 0.0007% neon
 Trace amounts of carbonyl sulfide, hydrogen chloride, hydrogen fluoride.


Find out more on [[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Venus|wikipedia]].
